title: Join Developer Network
subtitle: Explore new opportunities through your career and skills. Enter your information to be matched with companies that fit your capabilities.

personal_info.title: 1. Personal Information
personal_info.subtitle: Enter your name, email, phone number, and SNS account information. This information helps companies introduce you.
personal_info.name: Name

sns.title: SNS Addresses
sns.max_addresses: You can add up to 5 SNS addresses.

language.title: Languages
language.subtitle: Please enter languages you can use and their proficiency levels. You can add up to 5 languages.
language.max_languages: You can add up to 5 languages.

education.title: 2. Education
education.subtitle: Please enter your educational background. Education information is crucial for companies to assess your expertise. Accurate information increases your matching success rate.

experience.title: 3. Experience
experience.subtitle: Please enter your work experience. Work experience is crucial for companies to assess your capabilities and project suitability. Accurate information increases your matching success rate.
experience.max_experiences: You can add up to 5 experiences.

skills.title: 4. Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: Enter the technologies and tools you can use. Companies use this information to evaluate your capabilities and project suitability. The more specific your tech stack is, the better companies can understand your expertise. Record all technologies you've personally handled in your projects.

availability.title: 5. Work Availability
availability.subtitle: Enter information about when you can start working. Companies you may work with are in different countries with different working hours. Companies use this as reference for schedule coordination. This section is crucial for coordinating with companies. Provide clear information to increase matching success rate.
availability.start_date_required: Available start date is a required field

messages.registration_success_description: Your developer network registration has been successfully completed.

name.minLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

phone.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number.

startDate.required: Please select your available start date.

education.required: Please enter at least one education record.
